name: GMTK2022dice
description:
You need to enable full screen

Controls are:

WASD
Space bar
Input integers from 1-6 to the dice input
Input integers from 1-3 to the multiplier input

I didn't manage to finish but I like to show the things I did manage

Thanks to Hugo Lopez for chaging the textures to give it a nighty feel! Also all the free assets creators,  wouldn't be possible without them.
